https://jenkins.openbmc.org/job/ci-repository/71534/ : FAILURE

Do you have use cases you want this to enable?  I'm hoping that most of the match stuff will be used less once I get co-routines merged, but I know that'll take a little bit of time.

I think we need to add the dependency into openbmc-build-scripts first before this will pass CI.
Not specifically, I'm just trying to target all of our usages of std::function and make them as flexible as they can be.

Could you elaborate the use of zstring?
From the code it looks like it could handle `const char*` and `const std::string&`.

But the below description only mentions move-only lambda that is supposed to related to unique_function only.
Yeah, fixed.
